name: Cultist (Cbeattie)
description:
Be the first to collect 3 ancient and powerful relics and offer them to the gods to earn their favor! Build your cult by gaining followers and forbidden knowledge! Use your influence to snatch the relics from the competing cults' clutches!

Play the game here: https://tabletopia.com/playground/cultist-h1jdg7/play-now

Suits 3-4 players.
